content: I'm looking for some tips on fine-tuning my engine. I met a mechanic at a meetup a while back who offered to give me some pointers, but I haven't had a chance to follow up yet. Do you have any general advice or resources you could recommend? By the way, last weekend I volunteered at the "Rack Attack" charity event, where we helped raise funds for a local children's hospital by organizing a series of auto-related challenges.
